issue.title: [CI] Use compression with clcache
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5323](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5323). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
clcache has recently got a new option to compress cache entries. We should enable it on AppVeyor to get greater cache efficiency.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5323?focusedCommentId=16840463) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4315
